subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: The P.G.A. Championship winner Martin Kaymer shot a four-under-par 66 to take a one-shot lead after the third round of the KLM Open in Hilversum, the Netherlands.
snippet: The P.G.A. Championship winner Martin Kaymer shot a four-under-par 66 to take a one-shot lead after the third round of the KLM Open in Hilversum, the Netherlands.
